description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nDynamic Duos:
For each creature in your party that is a class you have exactly 2 of, those creatures deal 160% more damage. For each creature in your party that is a race you have exactly 2 of, those creatures take 80% less damage. This trait ignores other traits and perks that increase the number of creatures of a specific race or class. This trait does not stack.
name: Twin Gems
